professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with over 15 years of expertise in managing and optimizing large-scale database systems. Proficient in RAC cluster management, database security, performance tuning, and advanced SQL scripting. Strong technical skills across multiple platforms and tools.

key_responsibilities: Configured and managed Oracle databases across development
Performed database upgrades and health checks to ensure optimal performance.
Enhanced SQL statements using Explain Plan and Oracle optimizer hints.
Managed Linux and Solaris systems for Oracle database operations.
Configured and maintained RAC clusters to ensure high availability.
Implemented security best practices by creating users

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Civil and Environmental Engineering
